message: Has anyone had any luck with https://convore.com/api/account/mark_read.json ? I just get back a 405. I can verify and make a few other API calls. I thought it might be because I didn't have any messages to mark as read, but I created a garbage account just to test it.
Also, why does https://convore.com/api/ have the login bar at the top? I keep thinking I'm not logged in :(
@RyanOnRails 405 is a "method not acceptable" error, and the response contains an "Allow" header that tells you what method is acceptable. In this case, it's POST.
Braggle arggle. I had a sneaking suspicion that the 405 was caused by this. I just was to lazy to change get to post and test it. Thanks @protocool
Whoops, sorry about those docs guys.
@protocool is right it needs to be a POST
